test_scenarios.name: User Registration Success
steps: Enter valid registration details (username, email, password)
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully registered with an email sent for verification.

test_scenarios.name: User Login Success
steps: Enter valid registered username and password
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Project Creation Success
steps: Enter a valid project name and description
test_scenarios.expected_result: New project is successfully created and displayed in the projects list.

test_scenarios.name: Repository Creation Success
steps: Enter a valid repository name and description
test_scenarios.expected_result: New repository is successfully created and displayed within the project.

test_scenarios.name: Code Commit and Push Success
steps: Clone the repository to local machine.
Make a small change in a file (e.g., add a comment).
Commit the changes with a descriptive message.
Push the changes to the remote repository.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The committed changes are successfully pushed to the remote repository and are visible in the repository's file history on the GitHub web interface.

test_scenarios.name: Pull Request Creation Success
steps: Create a new branch from the main branch
Make changes in the new branch.
Commit and push the changes to remote branch
Create a pull request from the new branch to main branch.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Pull request is created successfully from the new branch to main branch.

test_scenarios.name: Issue Creation Success
steps: Enter a valid issue title and description
test_scenarios.expected_result: New issue is successfully created and displayed in the issues list.
